post.description: Check availability of cart items on given location.

post.summary: Updates prices and sets price date
post.description: Updates prices and sets price date. Order must be created soon after this call since the pricesUpdatedAt timestamp serves as the basis for final pricing. Client should compare the total price before and after this call to warn the customer about possible price change.

delete.summary: Remove a single document from item
delete.description: Removes a single document from item.

parameters.name: withDocumentData
parameters.description: Include base64 document data in response, false by default

patch.description: Patches a cart. Attributes available for patching: customerNotice

post.description: Change cart location. Recalculate prices for new location. Items with no stock on new location are removed.

parameters.name: withDocumentData
parameters.description: Include base64 document data in response, false by default

get.summary: Get list of fulfillments for order.
get.description: Get list of fulfillments for order.

get.summary: Get order by ID with refreshed item status from external services
